scripts.lib:build: ng build navbar && ng build disclaimer && ng build impressum && ng build dps && ng build images-grid && ng build contact-options
scripts.lib:pack: cd dist/disclaimer && npm pack && cd ../impressum && npm pack && cd ../dps && npm pack && cd ../images-grid && npm pack && cd ..
scripts.lib:publish: cd dist/disclaimer && npm publish && cd ../contact-options && npm publish && cd ../impressum && npm publish && cd ../dps && npm publish && cd ../images-grid && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.lib:upgrade: cd projects/navbar && npm version patch && cd ../selection-typeahead && npm version patch && cd ../disclaimer && npm version patch && cd ../contact-options && npm version patch && cd ../impressum && npm version patch && cd ../dps && npm version patch && cd ../images-grid && npm version patch && cd ../selection-typeahead && npm version patch && cd ..
